definition: one's thoughts fly to a longed-for place or person/to long for/infatuated/fascinated
to run fast/to speed/to gallop/to disseminate/to spread
to go (in a direction)/to/towards/(of a train) bound for/past/previous

sentences.english: After seeing the film the heroine in it swept Peter off his feet.
sentences.chinese: 看完電影之後，電影中的女主角讓彼得心馳神往。

sentences.english: And that future is very exciting," he added.
sentences.chinese: 這一未來令人心馳神往，”他補充道。

sentences.english: Just one sight of the photo can make anyone have a deep longing for the beautiful landscape.
sentences.chinese: 只要瞧一下這幀作品，便令人心馳神往。

sentences.english: He dreamt a dream of swimming up to see the sky above.
sentences.chinese: 她夢到自己游上海面，可以仰望心馳神往的漫漫天際。

sentences.english: She was responsible for delivering the first word on the movies, and it galvanized her.
sentences.chinese: 她的責任是對電影作出第一結論，這令她心馳神往。
